page.title: 20HILLSIDE
page.content: TWELVE YEARS AGO HILLSIDE WAS A FIELD CALLED SPRINGFIELD. THE BUILDERS CALLED FOX BROTHERS FROM BLACKPOOL BOUGHT IT.THEY BUILT 26 DETACHED HOUSES IN A CRESCENT-SHAPED CUL-DE-SAC.THEY WERE FIRST SOLD FOR PRICES RANGING FROM Â£10,000 TO Â£13,000.THEY ARE NOW BEING SOLD FOR UP TO Â£45,000.ALMOST ALL THE OWNERS HAVE TWO CARS.A TOTAL OF 85 PEOPLE LIVE IN HILLSIDE.THE GARDENS ARE OPEN-PLAN.THEY HAVE LIME SOIL SO PLANTS SUCH AS ROSES THRIVE BUT RHODODENDRONS AND AZALEAS DO NOT BECAUSE THEY LIKE ACID SOIL.GAS IS NOT PROVIDED IN HOLME AT THE MOMENT SO PEOPLE HAVE TO USE SOLID FUEL OR OIL FOR HEATING.(GAS PIPES ARE JUST BEING LAID.)TELEPHONE CABLES ARE UNDERGROUND WHICH LEADS TO PROBLEMS WHEN IT RAINS.
